mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.yuangong_uuid_number as yuangongUuidNumber ,a.yuangong_name as yuangongName ,a.yuangong_phone as yuangongPhone ,a.yuangong_id_number as yuangongIdNumber ,a.yuangong_photo as yuangongPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.yuangong_email as yuangongEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM yuangong a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.yuangong_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongUuidNumber},'%')
and a.yuangong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongName},'%')
and a.yuangong_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongPhone},'%')
and a.yuangong_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.yuangong_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
